unit.utterance: Dāstāne bāqebānist ke bāq dārad dārad az bāqaš golābi mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: it's the story of a gardner who has a garden and he is picking pears from a tree

unit.utterance: bad jam mikonad va bā zahmat miyāvarad mičinad tuye sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: he gathers up the pears with so much trouble and puts them in the basket

unit.utterance: yek bačeye šeytān va bāziguši miāyad yeki az sabadhā rā mipičānad migozārad ruye dočarxeaš va mibarad
unit.utterance_translation: a naughty kid comes, takes one of the baskets, puts it on his bike and goes away

unit.utterance: tuye heyne raftan yek dāne nemidānam doxtarešān yā bačemahalešān az baqalaš rad mišavad va havāsaš part mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: on his way, there comes a girl whom I thought maybe is a neighbour, she passes him

unit.utterance: va kolāhaš rā ham bād mibarad va mixorad zamin
unit.utterance_translation: and the wind take his hat off his head, and he falls down

unit.utterance: sibhā ke mirizad zamin yek seri pesar ānjā hastand ke fekr mikonam aval yek hālati bud ke fekr kardam inha mixāhand kolle sibhāyaš rā bebaran
unit.utterance_translation: the apples spilled out, there are a few boys there, I thought that they want to take all the apples

unit.utterance: vali didam na āmadand va beheš komak kardand sibhāyaš rā jam kardand
unit.utterance_translation: then I found out that they come to help the boy and gather up his apples

unit.utterance: bad sibhā rā ke jam kardand pesare raft va heyne raftan kolāhe pesare jā mānde bud
unit.utterance_translation: after gathering up the apples, the boy went away and so did they, but on their way they saw the boy's hat

unit.utterance: yek suti čizi zadand pesar āmad kolāhaš rā gereft va raft
unit.utterance_translation: they whistled, the boy came , got his hat and left

unit.utterance: bad inhā se tā sib pičāndand heyne jam kardan sibhā rā dāstand mixordand
unit.utterance_translation: while they were helping the boy gather the apples they had stolen three apples, while eating them

unit.utterance: dobāre residand be hamān jāyi ke ān bāqbān dāšt sibhā rā jam mikard
unit.utterance_translation: they passed where the gardner was picking the apples

unit.utterance: bāqbān āmad pāyin did .neg yeki az sabadhāye sib golābihāyaš nist
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner climbed down, found that one of the baskets is not there

unit.utterance: did ke ānhā dārand golābi xorān az ān baqal rad mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time he saw the boys passing him while eating the pears
